title: Bearly Saved Christmas
description: He’s a billionaire bear shifter and a white man, she’s a black women and together they ‘bearly’ save Christmas     Bearly Saved Christmas: A Holiday Romance Story   Krista’s grieving over the loss of her adoptive parents, bear shifters who had loved her as though she was their own cub, despite the fact that her skin was another color and she didn’t have a bear form. She wants nothing more than to mourn quietly and celebrate Christmas with her adoptive brother while they decide what to do with the ranch they inherited. What she doesn’t expect is the extreme attraction she feels for her adoptive brother when she lays eyes on him for the first time in years.  Bear shifter Leo has mixed feelings about leaving his billion-dollar business in California to return to his family ranch in Texas. But when he sees Krista, he knows he was right to never have thought of her as a real sister—because his feelings for her are anything but brotherly. Unfortunately, some people in town have different ideas about their relationship, and when those people lash out, Leo and Krista must work together to save their ranch…and each other.  AUTHOR’S NOTE: This is a stand alone science fiction romance with an HEA. This ebook contains mature themes and language, intended for 18+ readers only.  You Do NOT Need a Kindle Device to Read This E-Book, You Can Read On Your PC, Mac, Smart Phone, And Or Your Kindle Device
author: Olivia Myers
